TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsOneOf extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示可选的单词或短语的列表，其中所有可用于匹配语音输入。

span.span: Represents a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be used to match speech input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含可选单词或短语的列表，其中的任何一项都可能在口述时被识别。A object contains a list of alternative words or phrases, any one of which may be recognized when spoken. 可以从对象的数组 或对象的数组中生成替代项的列表 。You can build lists of alternatives from arrays of objects or arrays of objects. 使用 属性可访问列表中的替代项。Use the property to access the alternative items in the list. 类表示 `one-of` 来自万维网联合会 (W3C) [语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)的元素。The class represents the `one-of` element from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 有关 SRGS 元素的信息 `one-of` 以及有关其支持的详细信息，请参阅 [一个元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801)。For information about the SRGS `one-of` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [one-of Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/643cee6b-5082-46ea-9fc1-9f3646a95801).

related.span: 使用 SrgsGrammar 创建语法

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以 从对象的数组 、 对象数组或空列表构造类的实例。You can construct an instance of the class from an array of objects, from an array of objects, or as an empty list. 使用 对象而不是 对象列表中的对象可以将的属性应用于 列表中的每个项，例如 、 、 和 。Using objects instead of objects in a list of alternatives lets you apply properties of to each item in the list, such as , , , and .

span.span: Gets the list of all the alternatives contained in the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的可选字词和短语可能已 作为或对象添加到中 。The alternative words and phrases returned by this property may have been added to the as or objects.
